summary: A tidy set of items for converting WAV and XWM.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]-!- Attention. Support for this mod had ended. I am coming out of my hiatus from posting mods, and have decided to
consolidate my efforts for my new releases. Thanks to everyone's kind words and support. -!-[/color]

This file is a package of the executables typically already on Windows PCs needed to convert WAV and XWM files, along with a readme. Please use caution when uploading your conversions to Nexus, as copyright laws can be tricky, and I am not looking to get anyone banned.

Credit for the included software to the original owners/creators.
author: arecaidianfox
